Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:20.37]We don't read and write poetry because it's cute.
[00:23.75]We read and write poetry because we are members of the human race.
[00:27.62]And the human race is filled with passion.
[00:30.59]
[00:32.37]And medicine, law, business, engineering,
[00:34.25]These are noble pursuits and necessary to sustain life.
[00:37.08]
[00:38.28]But poetry, beauty, romance, love,
[00:43.47]These are what we stay alive for.
[00:45.10]
[00:46.29]To quote from Whitman
[00:46.72]
[00:48.40]"O me! O life!
[00:50.15]Of the questions of these recurring;
[00:52.71]Of the endless trains of the faithless
[00:55.14]Of cities filled with the foolish;
[00:56.98]What good amid these, O me, O life?"
[00:59.50]
[01:58.73]We don't read and write poetry because it's cute.
[02:02.17]We read and write poetry because we are members of the human race.
[02:05.82]And the human race is filled with passion.
[02:09.52]
[02:10.54]And medicine, law, business, engineering,
[02:12.51]These are noble pursuits and necessary to sustain life.
[02:16.97]
[02:17.84]But poetry,
[02:19.16]Beauty...
[02:20.78]
[03:59.46]
